title: Chasing Shadows
description: Enter a world of lost memories.The light-hearted world of Aimee Grace and Conn Donnelly turns into a time of adventure, magic and mystery when they crash into three fairies one gloomy school morning. They know nothing about why they’ve been kidnapped. While the meeting could spell doom for Aimee in a world without time, it delivers a terrible mystery into the laps of Conn and his sister.The magical Queen Maeve leads the way through past, present and future, ready to solve any puzzle that comes her way. But the Ministry of Silence has its agents fast on their heels, ready to eliminate the threat these fairies pose to their society, despite the tensions within their own ranks.They’ll all have to find out the hard way whether or not chasing shadows is a game worth playing.
author: Emer Penny
